price: 4. Waarlijk! Degenen die jou van achter hun huizen roepen, de meesten van hen hebben geen begrip.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yunādūnaka min warāi al-ḥujurāti aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
